about_the_game:
Unlock the full experience! This DLC adds more puzzles, gags, and moral dilemmas. Enter a new narrative behind the DLC door, uncover the meaning of life in the Secret Chair Museum, or discover the TRUE ending behind the Meet the Developer door.

Features

  • The DLC Door: Step into a new narrative filled more content than you could ever imagine.

  • The Secret Chair Museum: Unlock the Ruby Door to discover a world of chairs that defy time and space. It's weird, it's wonderful, and it might just hold the meaning of life.

  • The Meet the Developer Door: A mysterious door where secrets, surprises, and maybe even existential crises await.

  • More of Dr Chair's Platforming Masterpieces: Brace yourself for the return of Dr Chair’s innovative and ground-breaking levels. He's going for Game-of-the-Year this time.

  • Moral Dilemmas: Tackle new thought-provoking scenarios. Choose wisely.

Narrator's Note

Hey, it’s the narrator here. Feel free to ignore everything the marketing team wrote above. I didn’t actually add anything to the DLC. Why? Well, honestly, I didn’t think anyone would buy it. If you do, I’ll have to scramble to find some scraps lying around. So let’s save us both the trouble and... don’t.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.00 GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 450 or higher with 1GB Memory
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
